TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MaskedTextProvider extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: Represents a mask-parsing service that can be used by any number of controls that support masking, such as the control.

span.span: Represents a mask-parsing service that can be used by any number of controls that support masking, such as the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件包含一个掩码，由组成的原义字符和格式的元素，其所测试针对所有用户输入。The control contains a mask, composed of literal characters and formatting elements, that it tests all user input against. 不会永久关联与特定的掩码分析引擎，Windows 窗体提供它作为独立的服务，由表示类，该类定义的文档中讨论的掩码语言的语法属性。Instead of permanently associating a specific mask-parsing engine with , Windows Forms provides it as a separate service, represented by the class, which defines the syntax of the masking language discussed in the documentation for the property. 成员的许多类，请参阅同样名称的成员以及关联到其实现。Many of the members of the class refer their implementation to similarly named members of the associated . 例如，的属性类表示对所有访问权限的类。For example, the property of the class refers all access to the of the class. 使用的掩码分析引擎模仿掩码的编辑控件包含在 Microsoft Visual Basic 版本 6。The mask-parsing engine used by is modeled after the Masked Edit control included in Microsoft Visual Basic version 6. 中的文档介绍了其屏蔽语言属性。Its masking language is described in the documentation for the property. 涉及以下三个不同字符串类。The following three distinct strings are involved with the class. |字符串名称String name|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |输入的字符或字符串Input character or string|表示用作应用掩码的输入的字符。Represents the characters used as input that the mask is applied against. 在现实中，输入的字符串可能组成的多个输入的操作，包括， ， ，和。In actuality, the input string may be composed of multiple input operations, including , , , and . 因此，不能直接访问输入的字符串。Therefore, the input string cannot be accessed directly. 但是，处理输入的字符串的各个方面，这些不过并， ，和属性。However, aspects of the input string handling are available though the and , , and properties.| |掩码Mask|表示格式设置掩码，用于将输入的字符串转换为带格式的字符串输入。Represents the input formatting mask used to transform the input string into the formatted string. 此字符串中设置，但主要访问属性。This string is set in the and accessed primarily though the property. 掩码的特征也是可通过其他成员，如， ，和属性。Characteristics of the mask are also available through other members, such as the , , and properties.| |带格式的字符串Formatted string|表示生成完整掩码应用于输入字符串时的字符串。Represents the string that results when the full mask is applied to the input string. 带格式的字符串可以查询具有很多成员的类，包括， ， ， ， ， ，依次类推。The formatted string can be queried with many members of the class, including , , , , , , and so on. 带格式的字符串的完整值是可从和方法。The full value of the formatted string is available from the and methods.| > [!NOTE] > 输入的字符串可能表示直接用户输入，如下所示的大小写，或通过其他进程不直接与用户输入/输出操作相关联，可生成。The input string may represent direct user input, as in the case of the , or may be generated by other processes not directly associated with user input/output operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数表示的最常规的重载的形式。This constructor represents the most general overloaded form. `mask`参数必须符合定义的掩码语言类，该类中详细介绍属性的类。The `mask` parameter must conform to the masking language defined by the class, which is detailed in the property of the class. 非特定区域性不能查询有关特定于区域性的信息，因为构造函数将使用方法搜索要用于确定适当的分隔符字符的第一个非特定区域性。Because neutral cultures cannot be queried for culture-specific information, the constructor will use the method to search for the first non-neutral culture to use to determine the proper separator characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将添加`input`之后的位置上一次分配，由表示字符到带格式字符串中的第一个可用位置的值属性。The method adds the `input` character value to the first available position in the formatted string after the position that was last assigned, which is represented by the property. 此方法将任何由于以下原因失败：This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - 输入的值， `input`，不是可打印，或不匹配其对应的掩码元素。The input value, `input`, is not printable, or it does not match its corresponding mask element. - 在带格式字符串中，零个可用的编辑位置，或最后一个已赋值位置后，发生了任何可用的编辑位置。There are zero available edit positions in the formatted string, or there are no available edit positions after the last assigned position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将添加从字符`input`到带格式的字符串开头的第一个可用位置后的字符串。The method adds the characters from the `input` string to the formatted string, starting with the first available position after . 此方法将任何由于以下原因失败：This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - 输入值中任何的字符`input`，是否不打印的或输入的值不匹配其对应的掩码元素。Any of the characters in the input value, `input`, are not printable, or the input value does not match its corresponding mask element. - 最后一个已赋值位置后，不是有足够可用的编辑位置带格式字符串中。There are not enough available edit positions in the formatted string after the last assigned position. 如果此方法失败，不进行任何添加，并且该方法将返回`false`。If this method fails, no additions are made and the method returns `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将一个字符插入到指定位置或指定的后面的第一个编辑位置`pos`参数。The method inserts a character into the first edit position at or beyond that specified by the `pos` parameter. 此方法将前移现有的所有字符后的插入点移动一个位置，以便为插入的房间`input`字符。This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position to make room for the inserted `input` character. 如果发生以下错误之一，则不执行插入操作，并且该方法返回`false`。If one of the following errors occurs, the insertion is not performed, and the method returns `false`. - `pos`参数小于零或大于的带格式的字符串。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 带格式字符串在或超出指定的位置中找不到可编辑字符`pos`。An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. - 插入字符， `input`，不是有效的输入的字符，因为它不是可打印或其相应的掩码元素不匹配。The insertion character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element. - 没有可用的位置插入点右侧，以便不能移动现有字符。There are no available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted. - 移动现有的字符将生成掩码的冲突。Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask. 一个空`input`字符串将导致任何更改在带格式字符串，但将返回`true`。An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将从每个字符`input`到编辑位置的字符串位于位置`pos`及更高版本。The method inserts each character from the `input` string into the edit positions located at position `pos` and beyond. 插入点移动一个位置为每个插入字符后，此方法将前移现有的所有字符。This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position for each inserted character. 如果发生以下错误之一，不会执行插入，并且该方法返回`false`。If one of the following errors occurs, no insertion is performed, and the method returns `false`. - `pos`参数小于零或大于的带格式的字符串。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 带格式字符串在或超出指定的位置中存在足够可编辑字符`pos`、 要插入的所有从字符`input`字符串。Not enough editable characters exist in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`, to insert all of the characters from the `input` string. - 一个或多个插入字符不是有效的输入的字符因为它们不是可打印或与掩码元素及其相应元素不匹配。One or more of the insertion characters are not a valid input character because they are not printable or do not match their corresponding mask element. - 没有足够的可用位置插入点右侧，以便能移动现有字符。There are not enough available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted. - 移动现有的字符将生成掩码的冲突。Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask. 请注意，此转换发生在各个字符插入的过程。Note that this shifting occurs during the insertion of each individual character. 一个空`input`字符串将导致任何更改在带格式字符串，但将返回`true`。An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将一个字符插入到指定位置或指定的后面的第一个编辑位置`pos`参数。The method inserts a character into the first edit position at or beyond that specified by the `pos` parameter. 此方法将前移现有的所有字符后的插入点移动一个位置，以便为插入的房间`input`字符。This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position to make room for the inserted `input` character. 如果发生以下错误之一，则不执行插入操作，并且该方法返回`false`。If one of the following errors occurs, the insertion is not performed, and the method returns `false`. - `pos`参数小于零或大于的带格式的字符串。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 带格式字符串在或超出指定的位置中找不到可编辑字符`pos`。An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. - 插入字符， `input`，不是有效的输入的字符，因为它不是可打印或其相应的掩码元素不匹配。The insertion character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element. - 没有可用的位置插入点右侧，以便不能移动现有字符。There are no available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted. - 移动现有的字符将生成掩码的冲突。Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask. 一个空`input`字符串将导致任何更改在带格式字符串，但将返回`true`。An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不起如果指定的删除位置有没有赋值的字符。The method has no effect if there are no assigned characters at the removal position specified. 此方法不受影响的原义字符。Literal characters are not affected by this method. 删除一个字符后，将向左填充中删除的空白移动剩余的高位字符在掩码中。When a character is removed, the remaining higher-positioned characters in the mask will shift to the left to fill in the gap created by the removal. 输入将重置空出的位置。Vacated positions are reset for input. 如果掩码定义被禁止的字符移动，则会发生不执行删除，并返回`false`。If movement of the characters is prevented by the mask definition, no removal occurs, and returns `false`. 此方法调用是完全相当于对重载的以下调用版本：This method call is exactly equivalent to the following call to the overloaded version: `RemoveAt(pos, pos);`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 带格式字符串在或超出指定的位置中的第一个可编辑位置的方法搜索`pos`。The method searches for the first editable position in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. 如果找到一个对象，可编辑位置的值更改为指定的字符， `input`。If one is found, the value of the editable position is changed to the specified character, `input`. 任何满足以下条件将导致错误，导致执行不替换和值为`false`要返回：Any of the following conditions will result in an error that causes no replacement to be performed and a value of `false` to be returned: - `pos`参数小于零或大于的带格式的字符串。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 带格式字符串在或超出指定的位置中找不到可编辑字符`pos`。An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. - 替换字符， `input`，不是有效的输入的字符，因为它不是可打印或其相应的掩码元素不匹配。The replacement character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将两种类别的字符： 空白字符和提示字符视为以特殊方式。 can treat two categories of characters, paces and prompt characters, in a special manner. 通常情况下，将对照掩码，并测试每个输入的字符接受或拒绝。Normally, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected. 假定在该属性设置为值`null`，然后设置属性设置为`true`将导致对提示字符的特殊处理。Operating on the assumption that the property is set to a value other than `null`, then setting the property to `true` will result in special processing for the prompt character. 如果添加提示字符，这会导致当前的掩码字符位置要清除和当前位置前移到下一个可编辑字符。When a prompt character is added, it causes the current mask character position to be cleared and the current position to be advanced to the next editable character. 将优先于属性如下表中所述。 takes precedence over the property as described in the following table. |||产生的行为Resulting behavior| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------| |`true`|`true`|可以添加的提示字符，并且它会导致当前的掩码位置，要重置。The prompt character can be added and it causes the current mask position to be reset. 默认值。The default.| |`true`|`false`|可以添加的提示字符，并且它会导致当前的掩码位置，要重置。The prompt character can be added and it causes the current mask position to be reset.| |`false`|`true`|提示字符作为正常输入字符处理。The prompt character is processed as a normal input character.| |`false`|`false`|提示字符无效，尝试添加字符的方法时将失败。The prompt character is not valid and methods attempting to add the character will fail.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除现有的格式化字符串的内容，然后将应用针对的掩码`input`要更新的带格式的字符串内容的字符串。The method clears the existing contents of the formatted string and then applies the mask against the `input` string to update the contents of the formatted string. 以下条件被视为错误。The following conditions are considered errors. 带格式的字符串时出错，则保持不变并返回`false`。When an error occurs, the formatted string remains unaltered and returns `false`. - 没有足够的可编辑位置保存的替换字符串内容的格式化字符串中。There are not enough editable positions in the formatted string to hold the contents of the replacement string. - 替换字符值中的一个不正确，因为它不是可打印或其相应的掩码元素不匹配。One of the replacement character values is not valid because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入的掩码可以包含文本，并可编辑字符。Input masks can contain literal and editable characters. 如果尝试将输入的字符添加到中占用的文本、 的值的掩码位置属性确定结果。If an attempt is made to add an input character to the position in a mask occupied by a literal, the value of the property determines the result. - 如果此属性为`true`，可以添加的输入的字符时，使用相同的值覆盖原义。If this property is `true`, it is valid to overwrite a literal with the same value when adding input characters. 例如，正斜杠字符值`'/'`，无法添加到掩码的第三个位置`"00/00/000"`。For example, a forward slash character value, `'/'`, could be added to the third position of the mask `"00/00/000"`. - 如果此属性为`false`，它不是有效将值分配到占用的原义字符的掩码位置。If this property is `false`, it is not valid to assign any value to a mask position occupied by a literal character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的重载方法返回带格式字符串的位置开始的子`startPos`包括后续中指定的字符数和`length`参数。This version of the overloaded method returns a substring of the formatted string, starting at the position `startPos` and including the subsequent number of characters specified by the `length` parameter. 返回字符串包含提示字符和文本的值根据`IncludePrompt`和`IncludeLiterals`参数，分别。The return string includes prompts and literals according to the values of the `IncludePrompt` and `IncludeLiterals` parameters, respectively. 请注意，这些参数重写的值和属性。Notice that these parameters override the values of the and properties. 如果`ignorePasswordChar`参数是`true`，它将返回原始的输入的字符，并忽略的值属性。If the `ignorePasswordChar` parameter is `true`, it will return the original input characters, ignoring the value of the property. 如果此参数为`false`，它将使用的密码字符来掩盖可编辑的用户输入，如果属性设置为值`null`。If this parameter is `false`, it will use the password character to obscure editable user input if the property is set to a value other than `null`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于此方法可能会显示在用户界面通常由密码字符保护的信息，它应与要格外小心，以免意外泄漏敏感的用户数据。Because this method potentially reveals information that is usually protected in the user interface by password characters, it should be used with extreme caution to avoid accidentally revealing sensitive user data. 当输入参数中的差异时，请执行以下操作： performs the following actions when there are discrepancies in the input parameters: - 如果`startPos`小于零，起始位置设置为零。If `startPos` is less than zero, the starting position is set to zero. - 如果`startPos`大于或等于实际格式的字符串的返回字符串。If `startPos` is greater than or equal to the actual of the formatted string, the string is returned. - 如果`length`大于返回剩余的字符在过去的起始位置，仅剩余字符数。If `length` is greater than the remaining number of characters past the starting position, only the remaining characters are returned. - 如果`length`小于或等于零，返回字符串。If `length` is less than or equal to zero, the string is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法测试是否单个字符值表示带格式字符串中指定的位置的有效输入。The method tests whether a single character value represents valid input at the specified position in the formatted string. 此方法将返回`false`原因如下：This method will return `false` for the following reasons: - `pos`参数小于零或大于的。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the . - 字符`input`不是有效的输入的字符，由方法。The character `input` is not a valid input character, as determined by the method. - `input`与指定的位置处的掩码元素不兼容`pos`。The `input` is not compatible with the mask element at the specified position, `pos`. 最后一个条件可能依赖于的当前值， ， ，和属性。The last condition may depend on the current value of the , , , and properties. 若要测试整个输入的字符串与掩码，请使用之一方法相反。To test an entire input string against the mask, use one of the methods instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 则称该字符是*转义*如果它是有效的值，但未分配给带格式字符串中的位置。A character is said to be *escaped* if it is valid input, but is not assigned to that position in the formatted string. 转义字符分为以下三个类别：Escaped characters fall into the following three categories: - 如果提示字符进行转义属性是`true`。Prompt characters are escaped if the property is `true`. - 如果它们具有相同的值与该文本在掩码中，并且如果输入的字符进行转义属性是`true`。Input characters are escaped if they have the same value as the literal in the mask, and if the property is `true`. - 如果空格字符进行转义属性是`true`。Space characters are escaped if the property is `true`. 方法还将返回`false`如果`pos`参数小于零或大于的。The method will also return `false` if the `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适用`input`根据的掩码，而无需实际更改要测试的带格式的字符串的字符串是否`input`中的相应有效操作。The applies the `input` string against the mask, without actually changing the formatted string, to test whether `input` would be valid in a corresponding operation. 此方法也返回`true`如果输入是`null`或长度为零。This method also returns `true` if input is `null` or has zero length. 此版本的提供了两个附加输出参数，以传达有关方法的操作的详细信息。This version of provides two additional output parameters to convey more information about the operation of the method.
